article_title: The Question Debate Moderators Should Ask Hillary
article_text:
William McGurn is thanking CNBC for exposing its bias at last week’s GOP debate. “Republicans are always complaining about the media double standard—and last Wednesday night, CNBC gave millions of Americans the fully monty,” writes our columnist. While “CNBC moderators consistently challenged the anti-big-government assumptions of the Republicans,” at Democratic debates, the party’s “sensibilities about the fundamental role of government” are “left unmolested.”

Mr. McGurn imagines what tough questions would sound like...

twitter.description: The Question Debate Moderators Should Ask Hillary. Plus Bret Stephens observes a religion without God and ObamaCare creates insurers without solvency.
twitter.creator: @FreemanWSJ
